website_summaries.verdict: For this very low price, your phone will be well-protected, though there is no cover for the touchscreen.
pros: The rubbery material of this case fits great and is very durable, and the bumpers add even more protection
cons: It can get dirty easily, and some buttons can be difficult to push

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: So it may seem like a flimsy plastics case. But I am the most clumsy person in the world....I have dropped my 7Pluse more times than I can count in this and it has 0 cracks, 0 scratches, no damage at all. For a pretty cheap plastic case, I’ll give this 800 stars! I love it and will buy more in other colors. It even holds my poo socket perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple and useful case
customer_reviews.text: Ideally I would like to not use a case with my iPhone 8 Plus. I really don’t want the added bulk. However, I teach flute lessons and use my phone as a metronome and tuner. I have had more than one little student knock my phone off the music stand. This case is a great compromise between added bulk and phone protection. Between this case and AppleCare I feel covered.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.text: I only purchased after reading the positive reviews compared to negative reviews. However I wish I hadn’t let the positive reviews persuade me to purchase this case. Broke and shattered my screen protector the VERY FIRST day I put this on. After dropping it no higher than a few feet on two occasions, the screen protector to my phone is completely shattered. Terrible quality, no protection against drops whatsoever. Very thankful I had tempered glass or my iPhone would be completely shattered. Ridiculously misleading. Waste of money and onto purchase another one.
customer_reviews.author: Darian

customer_reviews.title: Perfect First IPhone 8 Case
customer_reviews.text: Case fits Phone Perfectly! Loving this first new case for my phone 8 before I customize to other options. Has a soft feel but easily is easily gripped.
customer_reviews.author: AuthenticallyZ

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This case fits perfectly. I also have a tempered glass screen protector and this case fits perfectly over top. I decided to get this case so that you can still see the rose gold color of my phone. The case is crystal clear and protects the camera and has precise cutouts.
customer_reviews.author: ajkailing

customer_reviews.title: Case caused serious damage to my iPhone!
customer_reviews.text: I like a lot of things about this case, but unfortunately it seriously damaged my phone. My phone slipped out of my hand, bumped softly against the wall, and fell on the carpeted floor. There should have been no damage, but on the back of the case, the corners stick out, and where those corners are, the phone cracked. See the photos. The damage was obviously caused by the case. I’m frustrated that the case I purchased to protect my phone caused the damage. I emailed the company, but have had no response.
customer_reviews.author: Stoutsa

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly - let's the phone shine through
customer_reviews.text: Case fits the iPhone 7 Plus perfectly - it's thin and doesn't add bulk to the phone. It's not slippery, so there is some grip to it. I like it because it's completely clear and you can clearly see the phone instead of the case. I think that it will protect from minor drops and bumps, but probably not from big drops. I had one for my iPhone 6 and dropped it a few times without incident, but I'm notoriously careful with my phone, so it might not be a good choice for someone who is harder on theirs.
customer_reviews.author: C. Washburn

customer_reviews.title: Got the crystal blue. Very slim and light weight ...
customer_reviews.text: Got the crystal blue. Very slim and light weight and adequate protection. The color really makes the white and silvers of the phone stand out
customer_reviews.author: Ryan DeMesa

customer_reviews.title: Turned yellow
customer_reviews.text: Was nice at first but turned yellow after a month or two
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic if you like having protection without sacrificing beauty.
customer_reviews.text: I love transparent cases and this one is the best I've had. It is a very strong case, the extra bumper on the corners are great for drops, the case comes around the front of the phone to protect the screen against falling flat on a hard surface, and it looks really cool when you turn the flashlight on and set it on a table or something. The case lights up!!! :OOO My only complaint is a minor one. It has started to yellow a bit from the sun. But then again, I live in AZ. Just about everything gets scorched by the sun here. Otherwise, it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: erik

customer_reviews.title: K.I.S.S.
customer_reviews.text: I carry an iPhone 7+ so in order to pocket the device better, I need to keep the case minimal but still need protection. This clear case fits well, has corner bumpers, is screen protector friendly so that I can set my phone face down on the table in meetings and provides a bit of protection for the camera lenses. It also doesn't add much bulk allowing my phone to fit in the 'tech pocket' of most cargo pants and shorts I wear. It's simple, basic and perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this case for over 2 months so it might look discolored in the photos but I assure you, you can’t tell when it’s on my phone. The case is bendy but when it’s on the phone it’s a great peace of mind because I’ve dropped it multiple times by accident and there’s no dents or scratches or anything. The case is thick, but clear enough so your phone still looks good. And the bumpers aren’t as annoying as I was afraid they’d be. A very sleek case with a lot of protection!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Nothing about this product was as advertised. It was too small for the screen of my Iphone 7Plus. My husband and I both tried every way we could to make it work, but ended up throwing away the entire package. The only positive part of the package was the earphone adapter. I was not going to complain, but I keep receiving annoying emails asking me to rate the product, so, here you have it.
customer_reviews.author: SGMitch

customer_reviews.title: Great fit; not bulky
customer_reviews.text: I really didn't expect this case to be very protective nor did I think it would last, but it is sure a whole lot better than the bulky case I used to have. It fit without any altering (yay!) and I've had it for months now and it has been protective so far. (Knock on wood) I have dropped the phone but nothing serious yet, so I cannot attest to its true durability. So far, I really love it!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Shuster

customer_reviews.title: Just another cheap jelly case!
customer_reviews.text: I tried to repurchase the same case I bought a little over 2 years ago using my previous purchase history... I was directed to this case, looked to be the same online, but the quality is subpar to say the least. This is just another one of those super cheap jelly like cases. It’s completely different than the other one I have and I don’t feel safe using it.
customer_reviews.author: E619

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I am super picky about my phone cases and usually switch them all the time. So far, this is the only phone case I have purchased since getting an iPhone 7 Plus. I love it very much. I have dropped my phone several times including on my gravel driveway, a tile floor, and cement. There is not one scratch to be seen. Update: I bought another for my newer phone. It’s just as fabulous!
customer_reviews.author: Jena Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but I'm not too confident about it...
customer_reviews.text: Admittedly, I purchased this case for my wife because she wanted something with minimal bulk. It is a nice slim case and it fits in her small hands nicely. But, I don't have a ton of confidence that this case will protect the phone if dropped. I am hard on phones so I would definitely choose one that offers more protection, but my wife isn't nearly as hard on her phone and I think this case will do fine protecting it from minor bumps. Also of note is that this case works well with the Maxboost tempered glass screen protector.
customer_reviews.author: Six String

customer_reviews.title: Not what I ordered.
customer_reviews.text: So I ordered this case for a new phone based off of reviews. The description was very clear as were the pictures. What I got was something that initially resembled the description but from there it was very different. The case fit differently, was covered in dirt and dust and keeps fingerprints far too easily. The case sent to me was also a ‘fashion case’. Perhaps this was just a mistake in the order being processed before it was shipped to me. Either way it’s not doing what i need and is being returned.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J

customer_reviews.title: My probkem is soft pkastic back. It touches back of iPhone and retains a splotch
customer_reviews.text: My probkem is soft plastic back of case when It simply comes in direct contact with the back of iPhone it retains a “splotch” rhat doesnt go away. It is like the case is disfigured. An ugly mark. Like plasticis stuck to back of phone. It looks messed up. Sent back. You can fix this be peeling off casr and reinstalling but whg bother. Seems durable but plastic in back is too soft and not rigid enough and so it somehow sticks to phone. Looks like water is inside case. Odd. Something is off here. Bad batch of plastic’ Otherwise it works fine. Surprised so highly rated. Bots?
customer_reviews.author: Momomentous

customer_reviews.title: Look no further, this is my favorite-no let downs.
customer_reviews.text: No need to pay for a case anywhere else. This provides perfect traction for carry/hold grip. Protects by coming up and over just enough to not interfere with most screen protectors. Extra bumper on 4 corners, perfect sized openings for speakers, charger and sound switch upper left (iPhone 7+) Volume & screen on/off buttons meet up perfectly with cover as well. Total see-through, no dark or painted areas. Light absorbing at night if you have strobe light with ring/vibrate. Feels and looks great. Seen the same for 50-100$ online & cell shops, talk about rip off! This is best.
customer_reviews.author: M.H. GG626 (JL)

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: The ONLY two times I’ve dropped my phone with this case on the screen has cracked!! I had a cheap case on it before for over a year and it NEVER cracked! I had this for 2 weeks and it’s the absolute worst case I’ve ever owned. Ridiculous. Awful awful horrible case doesn’t do anything its supposed to
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: I really love the iPhone 8 “gold” color and wanted a case ...
customer_reviews.text: I really love the iPhone 8 “gold” color and wanted a case that would show off the color on the back. I was pretty much done wasting money on clear cases that just turned yellow in a month so I did something wiiiiild and went for a clear grey one. This thing is surprisingly cute! The bumpers on the corners are not obnoxious. The clear grey really compliments the gold accents that come through. Not so stiff that you feel like you are going to pop the screen off your phone when you take it on and off. Power and volume button work like normal, no excessive pressing needed. Yay! I will update if this case yellows. Fingers crossed!!
customer_reviews.author: Dallas

customer_reviews.title: Not comparable to speck
customer_reviews.text: I usually pay $22.00 for the speck one which has rubber and hard plastic infused. It is a cheaper alternative. It doesn’t perform the same but it works! It comes off a lot easier and I’m worried about it popping off so I’m gonna switch to an old case until I get another speck one. But I’ll keep this one for back up. I got this to get free shipping but glad I tried it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristian Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Standard, nice case
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for me. I had a case almost identical to this one that was really old and gross, but I wanted it to feel the same in my hand. It is very nice, clean, easy to hold and protective, another reason why I like the model: it does not increase the width of the phone much nor the general volume taken up, but it manages to prevent the surface from contacting the ground if ever dropped. Plus, it has a little spot where you can feed a string through to make sure you don’t drop your phone (like a Wii remote has - as a matter of fact, that exact strap would work perfectly).
customer_reviews.author: Klikx

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I've had this case for 3 years now and it has been amazing. I've dropped my phone at least 50 times over the three years and this case (along with a tempered glass film), has kept my phone screen from cracking. It may not be the fanciest cover you could use but I'd buy it again and will for my next phone. I purchased the clear cover and while it does show discoloration over time on the cover, I'd still purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: SWAGS

customer_reviews.title: Good iPhone case for the price
customer_reviews.text: If you’re looking for a clear iPhone case that’s not too bulky this is definitely worth looking into. I’ve yet to drop the phone in this case but it feels sturdy enough to withstand a normal fall. As long as you don’t drop it too much you should be fine. The only down side of this is that the buttons are a bit hard to press, especially the power button. Takes a bit more force than what I’m used to without a case or with a higher quality case. But for the price it was kinda expected. Overall a decent buy
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Pretty & durable
customer_reviews.text: I like that the case maintains the feminine look of my phone while protecting it from being damaged due to a drop/fall. It is lightweight and not bulky and the rubber-like pink material means it will not chip like the harder plastic ones do. The power and volume buttons have a thinner layer protecting them, which has not ever interfered with me using them. And the charge port, speakers holes and vibrate toggle are all open areas. The raised edges on all four corners protect the phone from drops and bumps, provided the main face doesn't get smacked, as it is wide open making it easy to read the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Kolene

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used cases similar to this for about 5-6 years. I like the corner bumpers and I don’t think I’ll ever own a case without them. I had a couple for my iPhone 6 and never had a scratch or crack after dropping. I just got new cases for an 8plus and an 8. Got the blue translucent for a silver phone and it looks AWESOME. I wish I had gotten a colored one for myself, but as usual I always get clear and I replace when it eventually turns yellow. These cases are stylish and functional. I won’t buy anything else. I do use tempered glass screen protectors on all my family phones...
customer_reviews.author: NoFreeTime

customer_reviews.title: Good/moderate protection for home use
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made with the cut-outs all in the right places. Fits snugly but bendable so inserting the phone and releasing the phone works well. This case is for home use and gives the phone a fairly secure grip. My other case is a flip case to provide more protection to the screen when outdoors or traveling. This particular clear case gives the phone a good secure feel when placing it on a hard surface. Gives the phone fairly good shock resistance it needs when placing it on stone surfaces. Looks sleek on my space gray phone.
customer_reviews.author: Peter DP

customer_reviews.title: Too bad, it hurts
customer_reviews.text: The cut outs for sound etc are sharp and hurt hand
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Too New To Say
customer_reviews.text: This case fit my wife's new iPhone 7 Plus nicely. Similar to the ballistic brand soft cases that have the pronounced bumped corners for corner drop-protection. Hopefully she won't need to count on that anytime soon, from too high a drop place. Haven't seen any discoloration of the plastic itself, that so many others have noted but, this case is still new to us. I guess only time will tell...
customer_reviews.author: Upper Left Coast

customer_reviews.title: Would pass up for more protection around screen. 😭
customer_reviews.text: Well I was really excited about this case because it felt really durable. But not even five minutes ago I dropped it and the whole front screen shattered. I have dropped this phone multiple times and had no issues but tonight was a different story. I would recommend a case with better protection around the screen!! I even had a screen protector on it.
customer_reviews.author: Meg C.

customer_reviews.title: Superior protection but the clear case turns yellow
customer_reviews.text: I love the superior protection this case has for the phone and the ease to get on and off due to its flexibility. It would be a 5 star if it didn’t turn yellow after a few months. At least that is what the clear one did. However they replaced it for free with a new one after I wrote the customer service. I also bought it because they offered a free upgrade lifetime warranty. If you don't care what your phone looks like in a case then this is a great and sturdy and protective case!!!
customer_reviews.author: Donald WB

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice fit and appears that it will protect the phone in a drop. I haven’t dropped it yet, but my last case was scarred on the corner from a drop. I like the clear case because I can finally see the phone. The biggest drawback is that it feels much less premium to the touch than the previous leather case I used, or even without a case. That’s a minor complaint, as I wouldn’t want to drop the phone without a case.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Scratch proof! But your jeans may dye it!
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous about getting this item but it does exactly as it describes. I’ve dropped it face flat a couple times and not cracks! I haven’t needed a screen protector but I’ll probably put one on soon because I know my history. Because it’s clear, it shows off the true color of my phone which I like. It is scratch proof but not dye proof. One of the corners is slightly blue from being in my jean pockets but I’m not too upset. I’ll probably try to wash it or buy a new case
customer_reviews.author: Maryah

customer_reviews.title: 5 STARS!!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. It’s a lot slimmer than my original case, which I love! I’ve only had it a day, so I’m gonna give it a week or two and then update my review once I have had a chance to really get some use out of it. 7/5/19 UPDATE: So I’ve had this case for about 2 and a half months and I have had a chance to get some use out of it. I will definitely buy this again if need be!! Last night I dropped my phone on the pavement and not a scratch on it. I was so sure my screen was gonna be cracked.... IT WAS NOT!! Definitely a decent case for the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Rae Rae 85 15

customer_reviews.title: Great phone case for this price point
customer_reviews.text: I always read thoroughly through reviews before making a purchase big or small and I read several reviews of this case regarding air bubbles on the back part. So far that has not been an issue for me. My previous case was the Lifeproof Next case which was great but had its downfalls. The protection was awesome but the rubber lining on the outer edges started coming off and it collected dust inside the case on the back of my iPhone. I looked at other protective cases and they are all too bulky so I opted for something lighter. This case does the job and for a great price too.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Worcester

customer_reviews.title: works great, but has yellowed
customer_reviews.text: iPhone 8 Plus Case, Matone Crystal Clear Shock Absorption Technology Bumper Soft TP. I bought this iPhone 8 plus phone case to protect my phone but also show off the beautiful rose gold color. It was crystal clear when I received it, but has yellowed over the last 6 months that I've owned it. It makes my phone look dirty or stained. Otherwise a good case, easy to grip, sleek and thin enough to not snag on pockets or moving it in and out of my purse. I need to keep looking for a case that will stay clear, though. Or just get a colored one.
customer_reviews.author: Magnetgirl

customer_reviews.title: Didn't protect my phone
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was going to be happy with this iPhone 7 plus case but that was before I accidentally dropped my phone and the screen protector cracked and broke off on the side. It is a tad slick so I would caution anyone that buys this case to be careful. I'm changing my 3 star to a 4 star because of the way the company reached out to me about my experience with the cell phone case, I was offered a refund of 1/2 of the purchase price and I gladly accepted their offer and appreciate the response after posting my review.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda Joyner

customer_reviews.title: Great case for a good price
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this case since the middle of February & it still looks brand new! I bought this case because I wanted wanted something simple, but protective as well. I placed a pop socket on the back & it's now super functional. I've dropped my phone a couple of times on concrete & this case has SAVED the day. Don't waste your money on the big-name brand cases that look exactly like this one. This is a fantastic case for a really good price.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Coffey

customer_reviews.title: Not Fully What I Expected .... But A Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was buying a replacement case for the one I had for years. The one I had was clear with a hard casing. This one arrived with a soft rubber case, which I was not expecting. In all fairness, the product description may have mentioned this somewhere in the nitty gritty but I did not see it if it did. Overall, a decent product ... just not what I thought I was purchasing. So far the rubber is holding up well. I will use it until it wears out. When I do replace it, I will most likely look for harder plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Nae P

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a two-years old yellowed case for my wife. I was trying to simply rebuy but saw this case has more than 10k reviews and decided to give it a try. The case is totally different as what I expected: It is just a whole piece of jelly plastic, very thin and soft on the entire case; while my previous purchases were always harder on the back to keep the shape, only corners and edges were flexible. Not mentioning the material also feel not so trustworthy. My wife refused to put this case on and I had to buy from somewhere else. Maybe I should read through the negative reviews more carefully in the future. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s pretty good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I like the case, it’s clear but it gets that ugly yellow eventually. Mine hasn’t yet but my friend’s have before. I’ve had it for over 2 months now, I like how it looks and feels. I think I’ve dropped it twice now and the only thing that gets scratched is the glass screen protector that’s on it. I haven’t dropped it from high places but even so the case does it’s job. Personally though I wish it’d cover a little more over the screen itself like some otterbox cases do but I mean for this price it’s still really good for what I got.
customer_reviews.author: Laura V

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new phone case for my iPhone 7 plus, but I didn't want to spend anywhere from $20-$50 on a good case at a store. The shipping on ths phone case was very quick. I thought that since the phone case was so cheap it would be flimsy and look cheap. It is neither of those things! It's very thin, which makes holding it a lot easier. The back is very slippery, so I put a Popsocket on mine and it feels much more stable. Highly recommend! I may buy another one just to have a back-up!
customer_reviews.author: MFrossard

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer
customer_reviews.text: I have now had this case for two years, and let me gush about how amazing this product is. Honestly, I would have paid way more for this case. When it comes to dropping phones, I am the clumsiest person I know. I’ve broken many a screens on previous phones with other cases. I drop them on cement, concrete, asphalt, tile, etc. You name it. Two years. TWO YEARS! Not a single scratch, crack, or any kind of blemish. If you are anything like me, you need this. Period.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler & BreAnn Cook

customer_reviews.title: Quality feels very good for a basic clear gel case.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice clear rubberized case with modest reinforcement at the corners. While the material is smooth, it isn't as slippery as the stock phone case. It offers a more secure grip and the raised corners help secure it in my pocket. Raised corners offer protection fro drops on hard surfaces, but sides and ends could leave the phone vulnerable to drops on steps or uneven surfaces. Overall, it's a pretty nice basic case, but my rating could drop a bit with time. At this point I'm at 4 1/2 stars, but not enough to drop it to four.
customer_reviews.author: Oases 7

customer_reviews.title: Update- Not the best but definitely not the worst!
customer_reviews.text: Update- down to 4 stars. This is the first case of ALL the orders I’ve placed that have “yellowed” and I’m not at all pleased. Yes, it’s a great deal but I think it’s possible they’ve changed manufacturers. This never happened before. Moving onto another brand... Of course I love this case. This is probably the fifth one I’ve purchased. I get to make my own DIY case designs with these. They are highly durable and I love the bumpers. After dropping my iphones 7 and 8 plus- these held up! Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MrsMommyLoves7

customer_reviews.title: Best phone case- 3 year customer
customer_reviews.text: This is the best phone case I’ve ever purchased. I have dropped my phone countless times and never even a crack. I’ve bought these cases for about 3 years now. Usually just one a year and I’ll only buy another one just because the clear gets dirty from make up (but again- that’s a whole year). And obviously you can’t beat the price. I’ve gotten this type of case each time I’ve upgraded as well and have convinced both of my sisters to get it. Sleek design and not bulky. Have purchased the clear multiple times and just this recent time I purchased the Rose gold. Both are nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very thin and sleek protection
customer_reviews.text: Although I’ve only had this case a few days, I really like it. It is easy to put on/take off but seems to stay in place well. It is much thinner than the cases I’ve had before but seems to provide a good amount of protection for the phone (iPhone 7 Plus). So far it doesn’t show signs of scratching and it is easy to wipe clean. I’ve not noticed any smudgy fingerprints on it at all. Would I recommend this case? I just ordered a second one for my wife so, yeah, I’d recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Papaw

customer_reviews.title: Dropped phone down the elevator from the 4th floor
customer_reviews.text: So I honestly don’t know how this even happened but my phone fell and went down the crack of the elevator from the fourth floor! I could hear it all the way down as it hit the wall repeatedly. I went to the bottom level to try and find the phone and I could see it a little bit through the crack and it was face up. I recovered the phone a few days later finally, and the case and everything is still intact. The back was the only part of the phone that shattered. I mean it’s a pretty good case for $9, because I’m sure this phone would’ve been demolished. I call it a miracle!
customer_reviews.author: Leauda

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: 11/8/18 Update: seller contacted me after my review to make this right. It’s been a whole year that I’ve had this product and they were still willing to send me a replacement! Awesome customer service. I would confidently buy products from this seller again! Works well in that it protects my phone from drops. What I don’t like about this case is that it changed colors in the sun. I bought a blue case. It is now a dingy looking brown that looks dirty. Only had it for a year and it changed colors about 6 months ago. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Arriell

customer_reviews.title: 6/5 stars so far!
customer_reviews.text: Gets dirty on inside of case after awhile but really durable. It was supposed to be temporary case but has done so well for me. I’ve dropped my iPhone a couple times (no protection just this case) and luckily this thing didn’t even allow a scratch to befall my precious iPhone. Might also be much luck as the drops have been from my hip and always fell on the side or back of phone. Either way this one exceeded my expectation greatly!! Plus I get to see my awesome phone color in this case instead of hiding it.
customer_reviews.author: Rickesh

customer_reviews.title: which fits over my phone without issues and protects it fine. It also adds some grippyness
customer_reviews.text: I could swear the packaging costs more than the product - the packaging and presentation are top notch. Not to say anything of the actual case itself, which fits over my phone without issues and protects it fine. It also adds some grippyness, which is needed with an all glass phone. Case is also thin enough that wireless charging works without issue with this case on.
customer_reviews.author: Dradien

customer_reviews.title: Everything they say it is...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this case only a short time but I'm very pleased with it. I had ordered a much more expensive OtterBox clear case, but I prefer this one at 1/3rd the cost. I think the case looks great (I use the light gray with a black iPhone), and while I haven't dropped my phone the bumpered design appears it would provide very adequate protection. The phone fits snugly in the case and the buttons are easier to press than with several other cases I've tried. An exceptional value.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Maximum Protection
customer_reviews.text: This case is constructed with a material and in a way that it will absorb shocks from drops better than any other phone case I have owned. It is easy to put on the phone and very easy clean. I've owned at least 8 different cases over the years and this is definitely the best. I like the fact that clear is a color option so that the phone itself is visible. I will definitely buy this case again in the future when I have a need.
customer_reviews.author: Jondy

customer_reviews.title: Fits great, easy to grip, seems very protective
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this for about a week, but I'm very happy with it. It fit well on my iPhone 7 Plus. I attached a PopSocket to it immediately. It fell off once, but then I realized I didn't follow the PopSocket instructions, which state you're not supposed to use it for a time (30 minutes?) after installation. I pressed it back on and left it alone for a while, no problems in the past six days. it's not the slimmest case in the world, but most really slim cases I've had developed tears or cracks at the corners. Seems like this one will last.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher J. Norris

customer_reviews.title: Minimalist Case Meets My Needs
customer_reviews.text: There are not a lot of bells and whistles to this case it isn't anything flashy, if you are just looking for a good quality case at a low price point I would definitely recommend this one. I have not dropped it so I cannot actually say anything for its protective qualities yet... knock on wood. I can say that aesthetically it is a very nice case, it is slim but not too slim to the point I would be afraid it would have no protective qualities. I actually ended up buying a second one for my mother in law, and she seems very happy with it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Nelson

customer_reviews.title: As described!
customer_reviews.text: Knocking off 1 star since I received my case with smudges and stick stuff on it. Other than that the case is super light weight and fits great! It’s not bulky at all. You honestly can’t even tell it’s on there. If you’re not crazy about the clear you can always add a photo inside your case but still see the color of your iPhone. I’ve had my phone for 2 years and always has a black case an now I’m loving the clear to show off my rose gold phone that’s been hiding under a case!
customer_reviews.author: M.Lynn

customer_reviews.title: This is a slim case and still protects for those who want to keeps things simple!
customer_reviews.text: Not scratch resistant since it’s made of rubber. Easy to hold, and looks to protect well on the edges of the phone, but I feel if it hit anywhere else a couple of times, it would not protect the phone from sustaining any damage. The case is a little thick, so I may be wrong, but we will see. Also since it is a bit thick, the volume and power button are a bit hard to press. Overall it doesn’t look so bad on my phone and it is transparent, excellent slim case option.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Solo

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: The rubbery feel of this case makes it less likely to slip out of my hand. The corner bumpers give added protection if it falls. It has the low profile (thinness) I wanted without sacrificing basic protection. UPDATE Aug 8: WOW!! This case just saved my phone! I was biking yesterday and my phone fell to the pavement and then my wheel ran over it. My phone is totally fine. The corner bumpers on the case really performed their function!
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this case! I’ve had it for months now and it protects my phone so well. I think it’s so cute that you can see the color of the phone though the case! I stuck a Polaroid picture of my dog in the back and it looks so cute! I love this case I’m always looking for cases that are not only cute but will actually protect my phone when I drop it and this might be my favorite one yet! Because it’s clear I think it makes it a bit harder to clean but I don’t mind at all I think it still looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Camryn B

customer_reviews.title: Nice iPhone 7 Plus Bumper Case
customer_reviews.text: I love this case. It showcases my red iPhone nicely. The raised bumpers on the corners offer extra drop protection. It is also compatible with my iHome iPL24 clock radio. By that I mean I don’t have to remove my case to charge my phone. That is a definite plus for me. I’m happy my purchase. As a plus the clear case provides creative space. I plan to cut something cute with my Cricut for the back.
customer_reviews.author: M. ShellTop Contributor: Sewing

customer_reviews.title: No protection but nice looking
customer_reviews.text: There’s a raised edge that makes it seems like it’ll catch/protect but it doesn’t. I’ve used many phone cases but this one sucks. I’ve dropped my phone twice from 2 feet high and both times my screen has cracked. The blue hue is really nice and clean looking though if you trust a glass screen protector then go for it but this offers no real protection.
customer_reviews.author: Addie

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I bought a case for my iPhone 8 Plus. It is a perfect fit for my device. It was quick & easy to get on; soft smooth feel to the cover. I carry my phone with me constantly, use it for both personal & professional tasks. I prefer not to have any scratches on the device itself. As was suggested by another reviewer, I also bought a scratch cover for the front. Both covers fit together well.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Kate

customer_reviews.title: Long time fan
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased the clear case over and over. Knock on wood, my phone has never cracked, so even though it may look flimsy it is really a great case. I do purchase a screen protector along with the case. Because I purchase the clear every time, it does start to turn yellow from being used all the time (duh) and oils from my hands and lotion. The case holds up well and so that is the only reason for my re-purchase is to get a new clear one. I highly recommend this iPhone case.
customer_reviews.author: khadfour

customer_reviews.title: Works well, looks good, great value
customer_reviews.text: There were two amazing reviews about this case posted where a phone was dropped down an elevator shaft and another fell off the roof of a moving car and the phone still worked!! So I had to buy this amazing case!! It’s slim and has held up well through a handful of drops. I also use Mr Shields glass protector. Great value, looks good, works well.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing deal!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case for my mom's iphone 8 plus. Her old case broke wasn't working anymore and she needed something that was durable, affordable, and where she didn't have to worry about not being able to use her side buttons as easily as without a case. I ordered this case on Saturday and it arrived by Sunday. The shipping was so fast! My mom immediately put the case on her phone and loved it! You can tell it's sturdy and would help your phone survive a fall
customer_reviews.author: Gracie Rivas

customer_reviews.title: The SUPCASE brand case which this case replaced caused a terrible echo (sounded like talking into a tin can)
customer_reviews.text: This case was more malleable and easier to put on or pull off than the more expensive clear case I bought for my other iPhone at the cell phone retail store. Also, most importantly, the bottom of the case does not impede the microphone, even on the larger iPhone 7 Plus. The SUPCASE brand case which this case replaced caused a terrible echo (sounded like talking into a tin can). This clear case is pretty, clean, easy to push buttons, and as mentioned, does not impede the sound. Incredible value!
customer_reviews.author: Kareful Konsumer

customer_reviews.title: Great case for price
customer_reviews.text: My daughter paid $40 for case and I loved the way it felt in my hands so I was looking for the same case and found this one. It has the same feel for a lot less money. The difference is the back of her case is rigid and the back of this case is flexible. I don’t know how that wi compare over time and if it offers the same amount of protection but so far I love the case. It has the 4 raised bumpers on the corners and is easy to pull on/off
customer_reviews.author: S. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great iPhone 7+ Case
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased my second clear case to replace my original one that was starting to show a lot of discoloration. Thankfully, I've never had to test how well it holds up to drops, but the corners seem very sturdy and seem like they would hold up. It fits my iPhone 7+ perfectly and is raised up so that the camera doesn't sit directly on surfaces. My only complaint would be that it scratches somewhat easily. Overall, it's a great case and I would recommend it if you're looking for a simple, clear case to show off your beautiful iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: Rporter03

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: i have been using it for so long and have dropped my phone million times, nothing happened to the case or my phone which makes it very well worth the price I have paid for it. It doesnt hide the real look of the phone and looks very sleek and expensive unlike some of those plastic ones that get blurry and scratchy. I would say this will serve a long long time. If mine is still like new after having a baby and carrying million stuff and dropping it, then yours will too.
customer_reviews.author: Inobat Tuhtamisheva

customer_reviews.title: For the price, I got just what I hoped, and a little more!
customer_reviews.text: I got a new phone and didn't want to cover it up with a opaque case so I ordered this clear style. I also wanted to add an adhesive ring that affixes to the back of the phone (or case) for better grip on the large phone, and I didn't want to add it to the actual phone body. This case slips right onto the iphone 8 plus and grips nicely. The case itself has a bit of grip to it, but not so much that it sticks to your pocket as you put your phone in. It doesn't impede the volume buttons in any way. For the price, I got just what I hoped, and a little more!
customer_reviews.author: pukuco

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product great price
customer_reviews.text: I bought two cases for my wife's and my iPhones 8+ we both like them alot. PROS: It is very slim and has corner bumpers. I can put a metal strip between the phone and the case and place the phone on a magnet in the car while driving. All holes line up perfectly. Material helps grip the phone better. Very good product and great price point. CONS: I would like it to be more grippy because of my very dry hands.
customer_reviews.author: DctR

customer_reviews.title: Good protection, fits great
customer_reviews.text: These cases look great and protect your phone, I’ve dropped mine a lot and it’s still intact. The only problem is that they start fading I to a yelloiwsh color and stop being transparent. I have tried washing them with several different cleaning products with no success so just be aware that you might have to buy one eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Paolo Angulo

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Worth for the price. A decent phone protector. My only concern is the volume buttons and the lock screen button. I have to press it real hard using this case :/. It protects my phone from couple of drops, no damage to my phone. But, looks like the color is slowly changing to yellowisshh kida lightly!! Hmmm
customer_reviews.author: Avinash

customer_reviews.title: Great case at any price
customer_reviews.text: I love this case! I almost paid $40 for a case at the store for my new phone. I am so glad I shopped around. I have only been using this case for a few days, and I have already dropped my phone a few times - no problems at all! The case fits snug, but lets me plug everything in. It’s rubber and seems like a good shock absorber. It’s a tad slick, but I haven’t dropped my phone due to that reason. Would recommend and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Jones

customer_reviews.title: You will feel good about this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Bought all three colors for the family - fits our 8+ iPhones perfectly. We had Speck cases before - but when the corners started cracking We needed to replace them all. The price of the previous cases where ridiculously high and made our phones heavier and larger. I was skeptical about theses cases but I figured I could buy three for the price of just one Speck case. (I mean ...Really all cases are merely a mass produced plastic mold) This is the price that all cases should cost .... and this is the protection you want for your phone. You will feel good about this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Gatlin

customer_reviews.title: Good protector !
customer_reviews.text: After a while the transparency starts to turn yellowish but I think thats inevitable? I got this about a year ago but never had the time to review about it! It’s atill hanging in there, no complaints. It’s doing it’s job of protecting my phone. A few scratches but you can’t notice them unless you’re tilting it towards the suns reflection. I’m clumsy so I’m hitting the edge a left and right but thanks to this case, it has kept me from having to spend on repair
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Edges turned blue from jeans, but phone is protected
customer_reviews.text: I always, always, always drop my phone, usually onto hard surfaces, without much fear because of this case and because of my screen protector. I've never cracked a screen protector before, or seriously damaged an iPhone before, and I think that's because I always use these cheap, clear plastic cases. They look nice (no bubbles, pretty sleek) and they really do protect your phone. The only drawback is that the edges of my phone case are now stained light blue from the dye from my jeans. It's not a big deal, but just something to keep in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Li

customer_reviews.title: Overall I do like this case
customer_reviews.text: Overall I do like this case. However. The one I received may be a little bit defective. The cutouts are a little bit off around the bottom speakers, extra plastic that didn’t get fully removed around camera cutout, and the parts that cover the volume buttons are a little off. Those issues aren’t major, $ is right, but create a situation where I’ll probably try another brand in search of the perfect clear case. Major PRO: camera protection is way better than the other brand I tried prior! Not a bad case overall.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 16 year old son who has a bad habit of breaking his iphones, but also has a habit of taking the case off. He likes this one since it isn't bulky and has left it on since putting it on the phone and the phone hasn't broke - imagine that. Hard to say if the case is that great or if it is just due to the fact that he has left it on, but either way $10 well spent.
customer_reviews.author: kk18

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: Rubberized, clear case. Actually causes the flashlight to shine brighter around the edges. Lightweight. I already use a glass protector on the front of my phone, so I feel safe. Also, the edges are raised a tiny bit which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: SMGreenie

customer_reviews.title: Makes holding phone easy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Matone crystal clear shock absorption phone case so that I could enjoy the pretty rose gold color of my iPhone 7 plus. I wanted something that was thin but that would be easy to hold. The iPhone itself is so thin and sleek that it was hard to hold without feeling as though I was going to drop it. With this new case, I can hold the phone with ease. It has a nice, secure feel to it. Additionally, the "bumper" around the glass seems thick enough to protect it, yet the phone and case combined still feels thin. Love this case!
customer_reviews.author: CHW, Fairfax VA

customer_reviews.title: Great scratch protection.
customer_reviews.text: I like that this case is slim and transparent. My only issues and they are small is that the phone is a little too smooth at times when trying to hold it while laying down. Also the side buttons are a little non responsive at times. But if you’re just looking for a slim case to keep your phone scratch free, this is the case for you.
customer_reviews.author: Bettyanne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me, Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I have this for my iPhone 8+ and love it, It's thin enough to fit in my carry case, helps to hold on to a very slippery phone, makes it harder to get out of my carry case which is a huge plus because it would slide out before. This is the best accessory I have purchased for my phone. Would like one for my iPad but cannot find one.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen C. Zoeller

customer_reviews.title: Looks crystal clear as I had hoped.
customer_reviews.text: I love the flexibility and ease of putting this case on. My phone looks brand new inside of it. I previously used a life proof case so this didn’t feel as safe to me but the corners are padded well and the camera and face cutouts appear to be deep enough. I ordered the zagg glass for the front and feel better secure if I should have a drop.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry L. Batchelder

customer_reviews.title: Best iPhone Case for the Money
customer_reviews.text: This case is super cheap, but of excellent quality. It clearly protects the corners of the phone well. I have ordered two. My iPhone is silver/gray and it looks perfect displayed in this case. I bought the same case for my husband's iPhone, which is dark gray/black. On his, I notice, it looks as if there is moisture between the back of the phone and the case. I've had ID badge holders which do the same type of thing, so I think his case may be defective. I have never had this issue with my phone case.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Good protection
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for about a year and it’s still in great condition except for a bit of yellowing. I’ve dropped my phone with this case countless times and it’s still going great. A couple of small scratches here and there but not all over. It’s also not tearing or anything in the cut-out areas like many of my other cases in the past have. I find the case itself easy to grip. I just put the pop it’s on also because of the size of the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian Bearb

customer_reviews.title: The best case I’ve ever used. Seriously
customer_reviews.text: I have had this case for 8 months. And have NOT broken or cracked my screen. I drop my phone at least 2-3 times a day. And I’m amazed every day at how durable and well-made a seemingly innocent looking case could work. I think the bumper guards on the corners are the best part. I had an Ottor box case but couldn’t hear anything and people could not hear me. This is a great price but even better a well-made product
customer_reviews.author: amy alvarado

customer_reviews.title: Great Clear Protective Case for My IPhone 7+
customer_reviews.text: This case is exactly what I hoped it would be! Very easy to install, fits tightly, all buttons work perfectly. I love the fact that it is clear and I can still see the lovely rose color of my phone case. Extra protection on the corners, which I guess is where we usually drop our phones!
customer_reviews.author: JudeFromMo

customer_reviews.title: It’s a great case fits my iPhone 8 Plus perfectly like a ...
customer_reviews.text: The case was shipped to me in 2 days really fast service. It’s a great case fits my iPhone 8 Plus perfectly like a glove. It looks great on my phone, very thin and is so clear you can not really tell it’s on. I was at the AT&T store and they had a clear case but it cost 6x more. The customer service is great they even followed up with a email to make sure I was happy and if I had any issues I could contact the customer service department. Great product I would recommend anyone to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, basic protection
customer_reviews.text: The case is as described. Goes on easily and protects the back and sides of the phone. The corners are reinforced with thicker material. The only surprise for me was that it was not the kind of "rubbery" silicone that I expected. Not a problem.... just a surprise.
customer_reviews.author: pinefire

customer_reviews.title: Holding up well so far.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my old case that had cracked. I’ve had this case for a month and a half and so far it’s great. It has retained the clear color. It doesn’t have any cracks or scratches yet and it has protected my phone from a few drops already. It is comfortable to hold and has a nice feeling texture. So far I recommend this case!
customer_reviews.author: EPD073

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat this case!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had several of these and can’t tell you how great they are. I’ve dropped my phone numerous times and it has been protected without fail. Not only is this a great product it’s very economical and their customer service was fantastic. Very receptive and helpful. Can’t go wrong on this item I will always be a customer.
customer_reviews.author: JimboAZ

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic phone cover.
customer_reviews.text: This phone cover is outstanding. Fits perfectly, looks great, and very protective. Fits inside my belt holder easily. It is exactly what is needed in a phone case. Be sure to order for your specific phone model. This one fits both the iphone 7 and 8 plus sizes.
customer_reviews.author: W. Reel

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Great case. I had it for several months and it was nice how it was clear because it made it harder to see scratches. The case was thick and durable, my only complaint is that it got dirty easily and being clear it made it look discolored and nasty. I tried cleaning it but it didn’t really work.
customer_reviews.author: Madison Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST case I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: This is THE BEST case I have ever owned, and I've owned alot. I have an iPhone 8 Plus. I use this case with a tempered glass cover on the front. I have dropped by phone on my tile floor, on concrete and asphalt. And it bounces. The case is made of hard rubber with nice corners that provide air pockets around them. It's insane how good this case is. I ordered another one in pink this time since my last one was clear and starting browning/yellowing after a while (it reacts to the sun over time). I LOVE the pink case and have gotten a lot of compliments on it already. BUY THIS CASE. You won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Frost

customer_reviews.title: Buy a glass screen protector as well!
customer_reviews.text: It works great (along with a glass screen protector). I love the easy to grip texture. I’ve dropped my iPhone 7 a couple of times and it literally just bounces off of the shock absorbent case. Although, In those two drops my glass screen protector cracked in the corner (not the screen itself), so I would recommend getting one of those with this case or you might not be as lucky as me.
customer_reviews.author: Porsche

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love clear phone cases, but have already gone through three of them that claim to be UV safe, claimimg they don’t turn yellow. All three of them have lasted only a handful of months, plus the others usually have a super hard cover that makes it difficult to press the iPhone buttons without a lot of effort. The has none of those drawbacks! Less expensive than other clear cases and it is soft and flexible yet durable for dropping your phone! I should have bought 12 of them before they run out🤣
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful clear case, with a very "sticky" feeling to the plastic.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an inexpensive, easy to hold, iPhone 8+ case, and this one seemed to fit the bill. Very happy with what I have, and it seems well designed. Extra padding on the corners. There are two small holes in the lower fight hand corner (when facing it installed on the phone) and I'm not sure what they are there for. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Aurzada

product_meta.title: for iPhone 7 Plus Case, for iPhone 8 Plus Case, Matone Crystal Clear Shock Absorption Technology Bumper Soft TPU Cover Case for iPhone 7 Plus (2016)/iPhone 8 Plus (2017) - Clear
feature_bullets: [Compatible with Apple iphone 7/8 Plus]: This Matone Clear Case perfectly fits your iphone 7 Plus/8 Plus with precision cutouts for all buttons and ports. While featuring raised bezel to lift screen and camera off flat surface.
[Ultra clear hybrid case]: Clear TPU case is thin and lightweight for flexible durability. Clear View design of your iPhone 7/8 Plus to preserve the natural, naked look.

[Shock Absorption TPU Bumper Cushion]: Corner bumpers protection for drops. Soft TPU materials offer maximum protection from bumps and hard-hits for the back and sides of your iPhone 7 plus & iPhone 8 plus.
[Scratch resistant]: This cover case for iphone 7/8 plus is more endure scratches and scuff marks more than a regular case. Longer life and cleaner look for your iPhone 7 plus or iPhone 8 plus.

[Nice grip & flexible]: Premium TPU material provides good grip for a slippery phone, and easy to get on and off with no worries about scratching your phone. (NOTE: this case is only for iPhone 7/8 Plus. If you are looking for a similar case for iPhone 7/8, you can also find it in MATONE.)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars20,831 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
